label: 宝相華
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: This motif that was widely used in Tang-dynasty scroll designs. Not depicting any actual blossom, this flower was created by Tang designers and was brought into Japan in the Nara period. It is widely used in Buddhist art in the Shōsō-in.　[正倉院]
